TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时的行添加到控件。The event occurs when rows are added to a control. 当用户添加新行，对于新记录，请使用行值的处理程序中此事件是等于新记录所在行的新位置的索引这是一个大于刚刚添加的行。When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added. 添加新行时以编程方式，但是，值是添加的第一行的索引。When you add rows programmatically, however, the value is the index of the first row added. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例中处理事件来增加虚拟机中的行号。The following code example handles the event to increment the number of rows in a virtual . 在中使用的行数处理程序，以便它知道何时显示空白单元格与初始化单元格的新行。The number of rows is used in the handler so it knows when to show a blank cell versus an initialized cell for a new row. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#357](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#357)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#357](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#357)]

summary.span: 获取所添加的第一行的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the first added row.

value.span: 所添加的第一行的索引。

span.span: The index of the first added row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户添加新行使用新的记录的行时，此属性的值等于新记录所在行的新位置的索引这是一个大于刚刚添加的行。When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value of this property is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added. 当以编程方式添加行时，但是，此属性的值是添加的第一行的索引。When you add rows programmatically, however, the value of this property is the index of the first row added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#357](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#357)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#357](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#357)]
